title: Every thing included 2bedroom in a 3-bedroom apartment in Somerville
posting_body: ['I have a 2 Furnished room available in a 3 bedroom  and one bathroom house Starting from July 20 2022 to June 30, 2023.I am looking for a quiet,   two roommate to live in each bedroom.', 'One room per person', 'Vaxxed , and nonsmoker.', 'That keeps the common spaces clean.', 'My apartment is in Somerville in the first unit of a multiple house.', 'It is located a 10 minute walk from Davis square station and 3 minutes walk to bus stop.25 minute T ride to Downtown Crossing.', 'The apartment is also only a 5 minute Walk to Tufts university.', 'I  live near many wonderfulI restaurants.', 'It is a nice and affordable neighborhood!', 'The rooms and the living room are furnished.', ' The kitchen fully equipped.', 'To move in first and last month rent and 300 deposit required.', 'No pet and no parties', 'Amenities include:', 'AC Available', 'Dishwasher', 'Free washer and dryer', 'Storage in basement', 'Excellent kitchen, (new electric stove)']
